byline.contributor: Frances Robles and Lizette Alvarez contributed reporting from Orlando, and Mujib Mashal from Fort Pierce, Fla.

abstract: Gunman's attack on Pulse nightclub in Orlando has united immigrant residents of community that views itself as model of diversity; city's cultural and ethnic mix is increasing as more foreigners arrive, heralding changes that await nation as whole.
lead_paragraph: Even as he spent hours repairing gun shot wounds, Dr. Joseph Ibrahim could not escape the parallels between his background and the gunman’s.

headline.main: In Orlando, a Son of a Muslim Immigrant Rushed to Heal Pain Caused by Another
headline.print_headline: Orlando United: American City of Many Flags

snippet: Even as he spent hours repairing gun shot wounds, Dr. Joseph Ibrahim could not escape the parallels between his background and the gunman’s.

keywords.value: Disney, Walt, World (Lake Buena Vista, Fla)
